sentence.Network_en: Details of its past activities were zealously guarded.
sentence.Network_cn: 它以往活动的详细情况被严格保密。

sentence.Network_en: The males guard their mates zealously.
sentence.Network_cn: 雄性动物死死地守护着他们的配偶。

sentence.Network_en: Of course the more unpleasant a duty was, the more zealously Miss Glover performed it.
sentence.Network_cn: 格洛弗小姐越是对她的职责不满意, 她越是去积极执行它.

PerfectNetExp.abs: zealous 热衷的zealously 热心地zealousness 热心
exception n. 例外，特殊的事物zealously adv. 一心一意地，热诚地abuse v. 滥用，妄用.

list.abs: Such authority must be zealously guarded against abuse ., 这样的权力必须受到积极的保护以防滥用.
He is zealously competing for this promotion opportunity ., 他汲汲地争取这次升职的机会.
He is zealously competing for this promotion opportunity ., 他汲汲地争取这次升职的机会.
of course , these zealously religious & apos ; angels & apos ; are only acting based on lies , they are themselves committing serious crimes .当然，这些狂热的宗教上的“天使”不仅仅是按照谎言行动，他们自己也犯下了严重的罪行。
Some say this is because it is being implemented zealously ., 有人说这是狂热执行的产物.

entry.tran: （尤指对政治或宗教理想）热情的，充满激情的，狂热的
entry.def: Someone who is zealous spends a lot of time or energy in supporting something that they believe in very strongly, especially a political or religious ideal.

example.ex: She was a zealous worker for charitable bodies...
example.tran: 她对慈善事业充满热忱。

example.ex: He was a recent Catholic convert, and very zealous.
example.tran: 他最近才皈依天主教，是一名狂热的信徒。

sentences.sentence: "she worked zealously to raise funds for the literacy project"

auth_sentence.content: He makes his money by zealously managing an empire of middle-aged fans who live to hear his band's yuletide-themed New Age tunes.

auth_sentence.content: Parker causes a scene in the school canteen as he over zealously exercises his super dexterity.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Parker causes a scene in the school canteen as he over zealously exercises his super dexterity.

auth_sentence.content: Gardner and Wang were the best of the bunch, and Cashman guarded them zealously.
